q2: What is your opinion on Ronaldo signing?
a2: I think it is a good change for him and an added bonus for Juventus.
q3: Do you think Juventus can win the UCL?
a3: I think they stand a reasonable chance
q4: I think this year will go very well to Juventus and if you have a chance you will win
a4: They will finish top in Serie A.
q5: Why do you think Ronaldo will make a difference?
a5: Because Ronaldo is one of those players who finds success year after year.
